Mubarak Abdul Nasir


He was born on the 14th of June, 2002 at Aboabo, a suburb within the Asokore-Mampong Municipality. His parents are Nasiru Abdullah and Hawa Ibrahim.

Career

He had his basic education at Mbofra Turo Preparatory School.

He continued his studies at Amenfiman Senior High.

He had his Islamic education at Al Eeman-Islamic School, where he was awarded a Certificate of Completion of the recitation of The Holy Quran.

He now study Arabic Language at Islamic Training Centre in the Central Region of Ghana.

He is a member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a defender

He enjoys playing football at his leisure time.
